Verbal lease extension documents for (CUSTOMER NAME)
PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL
Dear Lessee,
Thank you for allowing Acura Financial Services the opportunity to further accommodate your financing needs. Your lease extension has been processed and your payments will continue to be withdrawn on your regular payment due date. Please note that any missed payments on the account have been debited so please ensure funds are available.
Along with extending your lease, we are pleased to inform you that we have also extended your loyalty offers; you will continue to qualify for your 2% rate reduction on the purchase or lease of your next new Acura.
Should you have any questions or concerns regarding this extension or any our promotions and loyalty offers, please contact Acura Concierge at 1-866-899-4440 ext. 7929 or by e-mail at concierge@acura.ca or your local Acura dealer.
Please find enclosed the signed extension and amending agreement for your lease with Acura Financial Services protected with the password you have provided.
Sincerely,
Acura Financial Services Monday - Friday 8am-8pm EST
Please visit our owners' website at www.myacura.ca, click on “MyFinance” to register and access your account online. __________________________
